message_1: A factory produces 5 different products and has a capacity to produce 150 units per day. What is the maximum number of units that can be produced for each product per day, assuming that all units produced are of the same product?
message_2: If the factory produces only one type of product per day and has a capacity of 150 units per day, then the maximum number of units that can be produced for each product per day is 150 units.
